org.forgerock.cuppa.model

Class TestBlockBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.model.TestBlockBuilder

  • public final class TestBlockBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A mutable builder that constructs TestBlock instances.
